title: Vytrvalost strigy (svitek)
content:
Vytrvalost strigy

Notes contain the formula for a potion made with the heart of a striga. The potion grants 1 Silver and 1 Bronze Talent when consumed.

This potion can only be brewed if Geralt chooses to kill Princess Adda while she is a striga. If he breaks the curse, he cannot obtain the primary ingredient, her heart.
